text:
Hello, HubSpot Community
My Company searching for experienced HubSpot Developer

*Responsibilities:*
• Teach and train our team on how to effectively use HubSpot CMS with React, including best practices and advanced features.
• Collaborate with our development and marketing teams to design, build, and optimize websites using HubSpot CMS and React.
• Develop custom modules, templates, and integrations for HubSpot CMS using React.
• Provide guidance on HubSpot’s ecosystem, including CRM, CMS, workflows, and other tools.
• Troubleshoot and assist the team with any HubSpot-related issues or technical challenges.
• Help integrate HubSpot with third-party applications and APIs.
• Share insights on the latest trends, tools, and best practices for HubSpot CMS and front-end development.
• Participate in creating internal documentation and resources to support ongoing learning.
*Requirements:*
• Strong knowledge and experience with HubSpot CMS (including HubL, templates, and modules).
• Proficiency with React and modern JavaScript frameworks.
• Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design.
• Ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly and patiently to non-developers.
• Familiarity with REST APIs and how to integrate them into websites.
• Strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset.
• Excellent communication skills, both for technical and non-technical audiences.

Hi Vitalii,

I am a Certified HubSpot Developer and a Platinum HubSpot Partner.

HubSpot Profile <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/hub-devs>

HubSpot Themes <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website?eco_providers=oAppsIT>

HubSpot Modules <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/modules?eco_providers=oAppsIT>
